mapper.sql: id, name, phone, wechat, qq, email, id_card, company, remark, status
mapper.insert: insert into supplier (id, name, phone, wechat, qq, email, id_card, company, remark, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update supplier
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update supplier set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from supplier where status != -1 limit #{start},#{end}
